alert.note: Alert for Kennebec; Somerset (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 21 at 6:35PM EST until December 22 at 12:52PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Maine... Kennebec River At Skowhegan affecting Kennebec and Somerset Counties. ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Maine...New Hampshire... Kennebec River At Augusta affecting Kennebec County. Lamprey River Near Newmarket affecting Rockingham and Strafford Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kennebec River at Skowhegan. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 35,000.0 cfs, Flooding begins at campgrounds in Skowhegan. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Minor flooding will continue. - Forecast...It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow morning. - Flood flow is 35,000.0 cfs. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
